data.what_is: Get the Best WhatsApp CRM Software Manage Your All Customers in One Place. Cloud-based solution that enables marketers to personalize content, track interest, convert leads into clients, and more. Get insights of your sales team, find your best performers and understand your sales cycle. 50% off on annual subscriptions. Start your free trial today. Connect with 100+ apps.

pricing_plans.plan_description: Get the best business automation marketing tool at the best price. Switch plans or cancel any time.
Supercharge your sales with instant lead alerts, auto-personalised content, interest tracking, easy follow-ups & lead management.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Wetroo?
The multichannel automation is helpful, so we would like to reach our users on all possible platforms and wetroo helped us in doing that.

What do you dislike about Wetroo?
Setting up was a little trouble for my intern.

What problems is Wetroo solving and how is that benefiting you?
As a fintech app founder, we used Wetroo in automating notifications for stock portfolio updates. When the app detects significant market changes affecting a user's portfolio, Wetroo can automate personalized messages to the user via SMS or email, providing timely insights and recommendations.
